glossary.meaning: Received Signal Strength Indicator; higher (less negative) means closer.
A BLE advertising pattern such as iBeacon or Eddystone.
Bluetooth SIG registered UUIDs and company identifiers used to decode common services.

proximity.note: RSSI is noisy; bucket is an approximate proximity hint.

recommendations: Label the device for local tracking.
Observe RSSI changes to understand proximity.
If authorized, identify the device owner in your environment.
summary: Likely Apple, Inc. device based on Company ID 0x004C. No standard beacon hint detected. No standard services decoded.
